original_text: Herod wanted to kill John, but he was afraid of the people, because they considered John a prophet.
korean_text: 헤롯이 요한을 죽이려 하되 무리가 그를 선지자로 여기므로 그들을 두려워하더니

sentences.original_text: but he was afraid of the people
because they considered John a prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 요한을 예언자로 여겼기 때문이다
